transcript: so if I want to go to the gym how do I make it as easy as possible for me to do that well I probably wouldn't pick a gym that's far away I'd probably pick one that has trainers and people that I already like I would probably pick one that has a lot of convenient hours just think about all the friction points that you have between you and what you want to do and remove them so it makes it easy to hit the goals that you want it's not like anyone else has like super human discipline everyone else has the same amount of like decision-making power and decision fatigue as you just make it easier to win and then you'll win more
